This is a testing session, firing 5 interrupts:
1. millis         1000/sec
2. INT0 external ~2000/sec
3. INT1 external ~2000/sec
4. INT2 external ~2000/sec
5. INT3 external ~2000/sec

The total number of interrupt (rising edge) events generated is 10mil for each INT0-3.
The Generator used is the BluePill with "interrupts_generator.ino" sketch.
My J1 CPU clock frequency is 23.96MHz (the internal oscillator).
The test runs for ~4921 seconds, take a nap.. 
The number of INT0-3 interrupt events processed shall be exactly 4x 10millions
at the end off the test.

---------------------
Mecrisp-Ice 1.2
